text:
Great for the price.  They cleaned room and changed towels each day.  Room has a small refrigerator.  There’s a second faucet for drinking water.  However, they only give you one keycard.

Note that the room is pretty small, need to step into the shower to close the bathroom door.  Ac stayed very cold the first night, and you can’t really adjust the temperature.

Area has a lot of Indian-Muslim, Chinese restaurants nearby.  Good grocery stores.  About 5-10 min walk from mrt stations.  It’s in the red light district but it seems pretty safe, at least for a guy.

I went to the nearby grocery stores to buy a fresh coconuts for $2.  Great coconut water.  In the morning I went to the Indian restaurants to get breakfast.

So long as you are expecting a pleasant room from a budget hotel, this really fits the bill. Obviously the neighbourhood may not be suitable for some but we found it very easy to explore the rest of the city using the public transport which is very accessible. In short it does what it says on the tin.

I stayed at this hotel for 2 nights, the room was functional, bed comfortable enough, and overall it was very clean.
The staff also took reception of an online shopping package which was very helpful to me, and were very nice & friendly also.
Location is good, near restaurants, supermarkets and bus stop.
I can recommend this place for a short stay

Its a budget hotel, I knew. I need to maintain my expectations on this.
First, the room is nice, not too small. But the floor is so dirty. I mean, there’s lot of dust on my feet when I step the floor. And the bed is pretty hard lol idk why. It feels like therapy bed (?). Thank god it’s still a sleep able bed.
PLUS point, its near the bus stops. And the staffs are nice.

I stayed at this hotel for 3 days and 2 nights, and overall it was a wonderful experience. The room was clean and comfortable, equipped with essential amenities like free Wi-Fi and a TV. The staff were friendly and always ready to help. The location of the hotel is also convenient, making it easy to visit nearby attractions. Overall, I was pleased with the service and would consider staying here again in the future.
